Module methanol
Package com.github.mizosoft.methanol.internal.cache

Interface DiskStore.Delayer

Enclosing class:
DiskStore
public static interface DiskStore.Delayer
Delays the execution of a given task.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CompletableFuture<Void>
    delay​(Executor executor, Runnable task, Duration delay)
    Arranges for the task to be submitted to the executor after the delay is evaluated.
    static DiskStore.Delayer
    systemDelayer()
    A Delayer that uses the system-wide scheduler through CompletableFuture::delayedExecutor.
